title: It's almost time to completely ruin a plat 5 ranked game (unintentionally; breaking no rules).
body:
Remind me again why decay exists? I have to play in the next few days to not decay from plat. But I haven't been playing League at all, so I will be playing at a high silver/low gold level.

And no, I'm not going to play 10-50 normal games just to get back some of my skill so I don't ruin the ranked game. If I have played a total of 3 games (1 ranked 2 normals) since August 26... Why would I want to do that? Obviously I'm playing better, funner games run by people who actually give a shit about their players.

So one of 3 things will happen as I play my last game of the season:

1) I will get lucky

2) I will get carried

3) I will ruin 4 other people's day

And number 3 is the most likely.

And no, I'm not just going to let myself decay, either. I earned my rewards, and I'm damn well gonna get them.
